Name: User Login and Home Page Verification
Description: Navigate to the login page, enter email, and access the home page. Verify that the home page is displayed correctly.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /login
Step 2: Click on input email
Step 3: Enter input value in input email
Step 4: Click on div innerWrapper -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Search and Browse Products from Home Page
Description: From the home page, search for products, browse by category, and view product details. Verify that the home page remains accessible.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on div innerWrapper
Step 3: Enter input value in input search
Step 4: Click on div shopByCategory -> Navigate to page '/*'
Step 5: Click on main productDetails -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: View Product Variants from Home Page
Description: Navigate to the home page, search for a product, and view multiple product variants. Verify that the home page is still accessible.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on input search
Step 3: Click on image productVariants (vnbTc88C)
Step 4: Click on image productVariants (vnbV200Blue)
Step 5: Click on image productVariants (vnbV88Orange) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
